properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:34PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Freezing rain and sleet expected. Total ice
accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Washtenaw County.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to fall to near
freezing during the early evening. The forecast for freezing
rain remains extremely sensitive to how far south the sub-
freezing air advances today and its timing. Flash freezing of
wet roadways is expected before sunrise.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible
power outages.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
